Errors.Error10024:
Customer service message 10024:

 In order to protect the privacy and security of your interactions, europeandestinations.com times out sessions after 120 minutes of inactivity.
Any transactions for which you have received confirmation during the session are not affected, however you must restart any searches or any incomplete transactions.

Please return to the europeandestinations.com home page.

Call us 24 Hours a Day, 7 Days a Week toll-free 1-800-430-0484.
